long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instruction Switcher is a browser extension that allows you to easily switch between different sets of custom instructions for OpenAI's ChatGPT. With this tool, you can create, save, and apply multiple instruction sets to tailor your ChatGPT interaction according to your needs. Each instruction set can specify what you would like ChatGPT to know about you and how you would like ChatGPT to respond. This makes it easy to adjust the behavior of ChatGPT on the fly, providing a more personalized and controlled experience.
